title: Name 5 busted champions you always ban depending on your role
body:
My list:


IRELIA, AKALI, PYKE, LUCIAN AND KAYN.

replies.body: {{champion:39}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:39}} and I don't play ADC but I am pretty sure it would still be {{champion:39}}

If I could choose for my team ?
Riven,Tryn,Yasuo,teemo,irelia
Akali would be in there somewhere as well since they made a mess with her kit.

Darius, Akali, Pyke, Yasuo, and Zed. 

Darius because he shits on pretty much all melees top and I tend to play tanks. 

Akali because she's still dangerous in the right hands. 

Pyke because fuck his ult. 
 
Yasuo  because I always get the dia mastery 7 "smurf" on my team

Zed because I can deal with him, but people in low elo do not listen to pings and just get double killed by this douchebag repeatedly.

uh 
top lane ban teemo and beg someone to ban darius (all my top lane champs rely on auto attacks and are melee, so teemo is a bitch and darius is obvious.
jg: yi or nocturne  (in my elo, they are played a lot, and I dont like it)
mid: ALWAYS YASUO (yasuo should get removed from the game) 
adc: vayne or kaisa (they are so annoying to play against, even if you shut them down and zone away from cs they can still be good in late game) supp: zyra (because she can do so much dmg that the game isnt fun)

Top Camille
Jungle Camille
Mid Irelia
ADC Alistar
Support Camille

Garen(top)
Pyke (adc/sup)
Zed/yasuo (mid/top)
Draven (adc/sup)
Irelia(jungle)

Also why kayn? Heâ€™s so easy to just shut down from level 1-9
